EmailTemplate.subject: eWeekly – A guide to email marketing for restaurants
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
July 16, 2020 Email marketing for restaurants As restaurants focus on reopening, an email marketing strategy can go a long way to keep customers engaged. Guests are eager to know if their favorite restaurant is open, what services they’re providing, and how to place orders. Check out our Guide to Email Marketing <[[https://www.ncr.com/blogs/restaurants/a-guide-to-email-marketing-for-restaurants]]> and share it with your customers to learn more about using email as an effective digital marketing tool to increase business and cultivate customer loyalty in a cost-effective way.
